010-01041-53.productVariation: Bundle (Includes Handheld and T 5 Dog Device)
010-01041-53.pvName: Alpha® Bundle (Alpha 100 and T 5 Dog Device), Australia

seo.title: Garmin Alpha® 100 | GPS Dog Tracker
seo.ogDescription: Alpha® 100 is a multidog tracking GPS & remote training device. This system allows you to track your dogs in the field for up to 9 miles.

version: Bundle (Includes Handheld and T 5 Dog Device)

overviewTab.title: Overview
overviewTab.content:
Multi-dog Tracking GPS and Remote Training Device in One

  • Tracks up to 20 dogs or buddies from up to 7 km away
  • Tone and vibration
  • TOPO Lite Australia and New Zealand
  • Measures dogs’ speed and distance travelled

An invaluable tool in the field, the Alpha 100 helps you achieve optimum performance from your sporting dogs. It combines proven Garmin GPS dog tracking with Tri-Tronics® electronic dog training technology. This easy-to-use integrated handheld system allows you to track and train your dogs in the field at a range of up to 7 km away, delivering their exact position as often as every 2.5 seconds.With multiple Alpha 100 handhelds and T5 dog collars, pinpoint up to 20 dogs or hunters’ exact positions on a large, glove-friendly touchscreen display even when they are out of sight. Because Alpha 100 comes preloaded with TOPO Lite Australia and New Zealand, you’ll always know your surroundings.

Track Your Dogs

Measure each dog’s speed, distance and the direction being travelled. Plus, receive notifications when a dog is “Treed” or “On Point.” A single Alpha 100 can track up to 20 dogs or fellow hunters when using either additional Alpha 100 handhelds or T5 device (each sold separately).

Extend Your Battery

When using the T5, switch to Rescue Mode to prolong the battery life. When the T5 reaches approximately 25 percent battery life, it will automatically slow down the update rate at which it pings Alpha 100 from every 2.5 seconds to every 2 minutes. This mode conserves the battery life of the T5, giving you more time to search for and locate your dog.

Turn Your Computer Into a BaseStation for Tracking Dogs

Load your laptop with BaseStation software to turn it into a field control centre for tracking multiple dogs and/or buddies (up to 20 Alpha units or T5 dog devices). View real-time GPS information on the larger display of your computer, making it ideal for canine search and rescue teams. And because it’s GPS/GLONASS, you'll get safe, secure and more effective tracking, even where Internet and cell phone service isn’t available.

mapsTab.title: Maps
mapsTab.content:
Maps for New Regions

Need maps for regions other than the ones that came on your device? See all maps that are compatible with your device.

Need a map update?

Update the maps that came with your device for the best navigation experience.

Check for Updates

inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box
inTheBoxTab.content:
T5 Bundle (Includes Alpha 100 T5 Dog Device)

  • Alpha 100 handheld
  • Rechargeable lithium-ion battery
  • T5 dog device with rechargeable lithium-ion battery
  • 1-inch yellow collar strap
  • Belt clip
  • Standard range antenna (for Alpha)
  • Standard range antenna (for T5)
  • Charge clip
  • Split adapter cable
  • AC adapter
  • Vehicle power cable
  • USB cable
  • Manuals

featuresTab.title: Features
featuresTab.content:
Track 20 Dogs
From the compass screen, get in-depth speed, direction travelling and distance away information for any dogs you've selected.

At-a-Glance Dog Stats
Get the information you always need, like your dog’s state (moving or on-point/treed), distance from the Alpha device, total distance travelled, speed and update rate, all on 1 screen.

Keep ’em Away From Hazard
Don’t wait till your dog is lost or in danger to get him back. Setup virtual boundaries on your map and receive an alert if he strays out of your geofence.

Keep Up with Your Buddies
Know where other hunters in your group are. Set your Alpha to show not only the dogs in your group, but also the other Alpha handhelds too (up to 20 T5 or Alpha units.

Professional Tracker, Professional Trainer

  • Glove-friendly 3" colour touchscreen
  • Preloaded TOPO Lite Australia and New Zealand maps
  • Electronic compass
  • Barometric altimeter
  • Hunter-to-hunter position reporting with preset messaging capability

specsTab.title: Specs
specsTab.content:
General
Dimension2.5 x 6.5 x 1.5” (6.4 x 16.5 x 3.8 cm)
Weight8.8 oz (250 g) with standard antenna and battery
Water rating IPX7
Touchscreen
Display Typetransflective, 65-K color TFT touchscreen
Display Size1.53"W x 2.55"H (3.8 x 6.3 cm); 3" diag (7.6 cm)
Display Resolution240 x 400 pixels
Battery typerechargeable lithium-ion (included)
Battery lifeup to 20 hours (Alpha 100)
Memory/History4.0 GB

Maps & Memory
Preloaded mapsyes (topographic)
Ability to add maps
Basemap
Automatic routing (turn by turn routing on roads) for outdoor activitiesYes (with optional mapping for detailed roads)
External memory storagemicroSD™ card (not included)
Waypoints/favorites/locations4000
Navigation Track Log10,000 points, 200 saved tracks
Navigation Routes200

Sensors
Barometric altimeter
CompassYes (tilt-compensated 3-axis)
High-sensitivity receiver

Outdoor Recreation
Area calculation
FISH FORECAST
Sun and moon information
Custom maps compatible

Radio Features
Frequency bandVHF

Additional
Additional
  • Range (line of sight): TT 15, 9 miles; Mini, 4 miles
  • Frequency band: VHF (The T 5, T 5 mini, TT™ 15 and TT 15 mini are only compatible with the Astro® 320 and the Alpha™ 100. The T 5, T 5 mini, TT 15 and TT 15 mini can be configured for operation with either handheld but cannot be tracked simultaneously by both the Astro 320 and the Alpha 100.)
  • Tracks up to 20 dogs (TT 10/15/15 mini and T5/5 mini) and buddies (Alpha 100) simultaneously
 

Specs for the TT™ 15/15 mini dog devices
